Communicating Between a DriverKit Extens.title: Communicating Between a DriverKit Extension and a Client App

abstract.text: Send and receive different kinds of data securely by validating inputs and asynchronously by storing and using a callback.

Handling Stylus Input from a Human Inter.title: Handling Stylus Input from a Human Interface Device

abstract.text: Process stylus-related input from a human interface device and dispatch events to the system.

Handling Keyboard Events from a Human In.title: Handling Keyboard Events from a Human Interface Device

abstract.text: Process keyboard-related data from a human interface device and dispatch events to the system.
